name: Dream Deflector (Rhythm Game)
description:
Collaborative effort from my first Global Game Jam at the Vancouver Community College in China Town (2019).

Rhythm game that lets you swipe your way to a good nights sleep! Compartmentalize all the bad thoughts (swiping left/right) and absorb all the good thoughts (swiping down).

Crystal Woo - Pixel Route - Background Art/Animation

Josh Sung - Tree of Audio - Music [ Personal Site: https://soundcloud.com/joshsung ]

GGJ19: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/dream-deflector
